Pre-Game Insights: India will lock horns with Zimbabwe in the 3rd T20I on Wednesday, July 10 at the Harare Sports Club.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The pitch at Harare proves favourable for batting, as evidenced in the second T20 match between India and Zimbabwe.Most Runs: Abhishek Sharma (100 Runs), Ruturaj Gaikwad (84 Runs), Wesley Madhevere (64 Runs), Brian Bennett (48 Runs), Rinku Singh (48 Runs).Most Wickets: Ravi Bishnoi (6 Wickets), Avesh Khan (4 Wickets), Mukesh Kumar (4 Wickets), Tendai Chatara (3 Wickets), Sikandar Raza (3 Wickets).IND vs ZIM Dream11 Prediction Fantasy Dream Team: Wicket-Keeper: Clive Madande, Batters: Wessly Madhevere, Shubman Gill, Ruturaj Gaikwad, All-Rounders: Sikandar Raza, Washington Sundar, Abhishek Sharma, Brian Bennett, Bowlers: Avesh Khan, Blessing Muzarabani, Ravi Bishnoi, Captain: Abhishek Sharma, Vice-Captain: Sikandar Raza.
